Name: Chicken Noodle Soup
Description: This is a recipe that was given to me by my grandmother. It is a very savory and tasty soup and I believe that all will like it. If you would like to add even more flavor, try using smoked chicken!!

Name: Haluski
Description: Haluski is from Pittsburgh’s Polish heritage, haluski is a Polish specialty combining cabbage and noodles. Order it at the Bloomfield Bridge Tavern, aka “The Polish Party House.

Name: Crab cake

Name: Shrimp Gumbo
